treatment-md.title: Peruanocotyle Chero, Cruces, Sáez & Luque, 2018, n. gen.
treatment-md.article-title: A new genus and species of the Dasybatotreminae Bychowsky, 1957 (Monogenea: Monocotylidae), parasitic on Hypanus dipterurus (Jordan & Gilbert) (Myliobatiformes: Dasyatidae) in the Southeastern Pacific Ocean off Peru
